properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v1 c1 v2 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There’s nothing worth more That could ever come close No thing can compare You’re our living hope Your presence, Lord I’ve tasted and seen Of the sweetest of loves Where my heart becomes free And my shame is undone Your presence, Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us become more aware of Your presence Let us experience the glory of Your goodness{/lang-eng}
